description.value: This flanged rod allows you to control gravitational forces around a single object within 100 feet. When you activate the baton, you can move an object of no more than 25 pounds or 2 bulk up to 20 feet per round in any direction (including up or down), but you canâ€™t move it farther than 100 feet from you. If you attempt to move an object that another creature is holding, that creature can attempt a DC 15 Reflex save to prevent you from removing the object from its grasp.
